com.adidas.ui.util

Class IndexScroller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.ui.util.IndexScroller

  • public class IndexScroller
extends java.lang.Object
    The IndexScroller is an element that can be attached to a ListView to easily scroll through it via an index shortcut (first letter of the element)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor method.
